doc:
Eric Lloyd https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Lloyd 0 Eric Lloyd (born David Eric Lloyd Morelli; May 19, 1986) is an American actor, comedian, musician and producer. Lloyd is best known for work as a child actor in such roles as Charlie Calvin in Disney's The Santa Clause film trilogy, and as "Little John" Warner in the NBC television series Jesse. Eric_Lloyd ( born David_Eric_Lloyd_Morelli ; May_19_,_1986 ) is an_American_actor , comedian , musician_and_producer . Lloyd is_best_known for work as a_child_actor in such_roles as Charlie_Calvin in Disney 's_The_Santa_Clause_film_trilogy , and as " Little_John_"_Warner in the_NBC_television_series_Jesse .
